example_sentences.en: The girl took a pen.
The family booked a room at the hotel.
The man thanked the doctor.
The army attacked the enemy.
The child ran in the garden.
The weather was nice.
The water boils on the fire.
The man believed in God.
The doctor weighed the patient.
He saw the ocean.
The man turned on the TV.
The man owns a big house.
The writer influenced the readers.
The student returned home.
The traveler returned from his trip.
The news worried the mother.
The father was worried about his son.
The thief stole the money.
The boy lied to his mother.
The Earth revolves around the sun.
The student got up from his place.
I met my friend at the cafe.
example_sentences.ru: Я встретил своего друга в кафе.

example_sentences.en: The friends met each other at the airport.
The man entered the room.
The girl chose the red dress.
He went out of the house in the morning.
My father grilled the meat in the garden.
example_sentences.ru: Мой отец жарил мясо в саду.

example_sentences.en: The mother cooked the dinner.
The tourist strolled in the old city.
The teacher gave the students books.
The train moved slowly.
What did you do yesterday?
The child held his mother's hand.
She added sugar to the tea.
The scientist proved his theory.
The soldiers fought bravely.
I am thinking about a solution to the problem.
I believe that he is right.
The wind blew strongly.
I like to ride the bicycle.
The patient complained of the pain.
The worker complained about his manager.
The mother fried the potatoes in the oil.
I waited for the bus for an hour.
I wish you a happy birthday.
example_sentences.ru: Я желаю тебе счастливого дня рождения.

example_sentences.en: My grandfather lived for 100 years.

translations.en: to live (in a place), to reside

example_sentences.en: I live in a beautiful apartment.
The child got sick yesterday.
The mother cares for her children.
I forgot my key at home.
Success depends on hard work.
The student asked the teacher a question.
The film ended at midnight.
The worker finished his work.
He closed the door behind him.
The doctor forbade him from smoking.
I ordered a coffee from the waiter.
The lawyer defends the accused.
Do you know the answer?
He neglected his school homework.
example_sentences.ru: Он пренебрёг своим школьным домашним заданием.

example_sentences.en: The children played in the garden.
I went to the market.
He changed his mind at the last moment.
example_sentences.ru: Он изменил свое мнение в последний момент.

example_sentences.en: The tailor measured the length of the fabric.

translations.en: to look for, to search for

example_sentences.en: I am looking for my keys.
You must use this computer.
The farmer used the tractor.
He smokes a lot and this is dangerous.
example_sentences.ru: Он много курит, и это опасно.

example_sentences.en: The boy ate an apple.
The bird is flying in the sky.
He lay down on the bed to rest.
example_sentences.ru: Он лег на кровать, чтобы отдохнуть.

example_sentences.en: I love my family very much.
The water froze in the winter.
She washed her hands with soap.
I found the solution to the problem.
He wrote a letter to his friend.
The student learned the Arabic language.
The hotel is located on the beach.
The lesson began ten minutes ago.
He hates lies.
He carried the heavy bag.
I liked the film (lit: The film pleased me).
I need help.
He promised me to come tomorrow.
The students discussed the topic.
The teacher explained the lesson clearly.
The tourist described the city accurately.
I tidied up my room before the guests arrived.
example_sentences.ru: Я прибрал свою комнату до прихода гостей.

example_sentences.en: The manager organized a meeting for the employees.
The man stood waiting for the bus.
The student answered the teacher's question.
He did not reply to my message.
example_sentences.ru: Он не ответил на мое сообщение.

example_sentences.en: He refused the offer presented to him.
example_sentences.ru: Он отказался от предложенного ему предложения.

example_sentences.en: The child opened the door.
My friend (f.) sent a message.
The rain fell heavily.

example_sentences.ar: تَرْجَمَ الكِتَابَ مِنَ الإِنْجِلِيزِيَّةِ إِلَى العَرَبِيَّةِ.
example_sentences.translit: tarjama al-kitāba min al-ʾinjilīziyyah ʾilā al-ʿarabiyyah.
example_sentences.en: He translated the book from English to Arabic.
example_sentences.ru: Он перевел книгу с английского на арабский.

example_sentences.en: My family moved to a new city.
example_sentences.ru: Моя семья переехала в новый город.

example_sentences.en: He moved the furniture to the new apartment.
example_sentences.ru: Он перевез мебель в новую квартиру.

example_sentences.en: The girl sings a beautiful song.
I drink coffee every morning.
The boys are swimming in the sea.
The baby cried because he is hungry.
example_sentences.ru: Ребенок плакал, потому что он голоден.

example_sentences.en: I paid the dinner bill.
Our team won the match.
Can you repeat the question?
The man climbed the ladder.
The sun rises from the east.
The manager confirmed the meeting time.
My father allowed me to go out.
The seller displayed his products.
The train will leave soon.
I bought a new car.
He put the books on the shelf.
I received an important message.
Do you remember my name?
I helped the old woman carry the bags.
example_sentences.ru: Я помог пожилой женщине нести сумки.

example_sentences.en: Did you understand the lesson?
He tried the new food.
He tried to open the door.
I visited my grandmother on the weekend.
example_sentences.ru: Я навестил свою бабушку на выходных.

example_sentences.en: The family celebrated the birthday.
The student presented his project.
My mother warned me of the danger.
example_sentences.ru: Моя мать предупредила меня об опасности.

translations.en: to be cut off, to be interrupted

example_sentences.en: The electricity was cut off.
The train arrived at the station.

example_sentences.ar: هَلْ يُمْكِنُكَ أَنْ تُحْضِرَ لِي كُوبَ مَاءٍ؟
example_sentences.translit: hal yumkinuka ʾan tuḥḍira lī kūba māʾ?
example_sentences.en: Can you bring me a cup of water?
I have breakfast at 7 AM.
He accepted the invitation to attend the party.
My friend came to visit me.
Winter came early this year.
example_sentences.ru: Зима пришла рано в этом году.

example_sentences.en: I spent a wonderful vacation.
He sold his old car.

example_sentences.ar: اسْتَمَرَّ فِي العَمَلِ حَتَّى وَقْتٍ مُتَأَخِّرٍ.
example_sentences.translit: istamarra fī al-ʿamali ḥattā waqtin mutaʾakhkhir.
example_sentences.en: He continued working until late.
Our team lost the match.
The accident happened yesterday.
He woke up from his sleep early.

example_sentences.ar: أَسْتَيْقِظُ كُلَّ يَوْمٍ فِي السَّادِسَةِ صَبَاحًا.
example_sentences.translit: ʾastayqiẓu kulla yawmin fī as-sādisah ṣabāḥan.
example_sentences.en: I wake up every day at 6 AM.
example_sentences.ru: Я просыпаюсь каждый день в 6 утра.

example_sentences.en: The cat jumped on the table.
I work in a big company.
The children were happy with the gifts.
I speak a little Arabic.
He spoke with his friend on the phone.
example_sentences.ru: Он разговаривал со своим другом по телефону.

example_sentences.en: The plants grow quickly in the spring.

translations.en: to grow up, to become bigger

example_sentences.ar: عِنْدَمَا أَكْبُرُ، أُرِيدُ أَنْ أُصْبِحَ طَبِيبًا.
example_sentences.translit: ʿindamā ʾakburu, ʾurīdu ʾan ʾuṣbiḥa ṭabīban.
example_sentences.en: When I grow up, I want to become a doctor.
example_sentences.ru: Когда я вырасту, я хочу стать врачом.

example_sentences.en: The chef chopped the vegetables.
The mechanic fixed the car.
I decided to travel tomorrow.
The artist drew a beautiful painting.
I was born in Cairo.
He sat on the chair.
He said that he will come.
The boy broke the glass.
The cup broke.
I like to listen to music.
Do you hear me?
He mixed the ingredients together.
I watched a beautiful film yesterday.
He looked at the sky.
Everyone laughed at the joke.
My weight decreased this month.
example_sentences.ru: Мой вес уменьшился в этом месяце.

example_sentences.en: The children collected shells on the beach.
The manager met with the employees.
My father advised me to study well.
example_sentences.ru: Мой отец посоветовал мне хорошо учиться.

example_sentences.en: I doubt his words.
The manager informed me of the new decision.
example_sentences.ru: Менеджер сообщил мне о новом решении.

example_sentences.en: The child sleeps in his bed.
He got off the bus.
Don't compare yourself with others.
His health improved after the treatment.
The area of the forest became smaller.
The weather became cold.
How much does this shirt cost?
He suffers from a headache.
The workers built a new bridge.
We are planning to travel in the summer.
The child counted his money.
I think that he will be late.
The girl dances lightly.
He failed the exam.
He lost his key.

example_sentences.ar: أَضَاعَ وَقْتَهُ فِي أَشْيَاءَ غَيْرِ مُهِمَّةٍ.
example_sentences.translit: ʾaḍāʿa waqtahu fī ʾašyāʾa ghayri muhimmah.
example_sentences.en: He wasted his time on unimportant things.
example_sentences.ru: Он потратил свое время на неважные вещи.

example_sentences.en: My key is lost and I can't find it.
example_sentences.ru: Мой ключ потерялся, и я не могу его найти.

example_sentences.en: The team trains every day.
He withdrew money from the ATM.
The price of petrol increased.
His grandfather passed away last year.
example_sentences.ru: Его дедушка скончался в прошлом году.

example_sentences.en: She smiled when she saw me.
The man died in an accident.
Are you able to carry this?
I cannot come tomorrow.
The student succeeded in the exam.

example_sentences.ar: تَعِبْتُ بَعْدَ يَوْمٍ طَوِيلٍ مِنَ العَمَلِ.
example_sentences.translit: taʿibtu baʿda yawmin ṭawīlin min al-ʿamal.
example_sentences.en: I got tired after a long day of work.
example_sentences.ru: Я устал после долгого рабочего дня.

example_sentences.en: He studies medicine at the university.
I want to drink water.
She cleaned the entire house.
I like to read books.
He smelled the scent of the rose.
I like to walk in the park.
